mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: animal meats and by-products, extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by fish (ocean fish 4%), molluscs and crustaceans (shrimp 4%), mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meat and by-products, extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by fish (4%salmon), molluscs and crustaceans (shrimp 4%), mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meat and by-products, extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products (4%square), molluscs and crustaceans (shrimp 4%), mineral substances, sugars. Composition: animal meats and by-products, extracts from vegetable proteins, fish and fish by-products (tuna 4%), molluscs and crustaceans (shrimp 4%), mineral substances, sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional Additives: IU/kg : Vit A : 700; Vit D3 : 105 [excluding recipe with Tuna: 0]; mg/kg : Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate : (Fe: 8.0); Calcium iodate anhydrous : (I: 0.20); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate : (Cu: 0.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate : (Mn: 1.5); Zinc sulphate monohydrate : (Zn: 14.5); Taurine : 440. flavourings.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat is a true gourmet, but sometimes it is difficult to find exactly her taste? For this reason GOURMET has created Perle - Pleasure of the Sea. The delicate varieties will appeal to your cat's senses in an irresistible way every day. Exquisite strips of fish were cooked in a tasty sauce to preserve the pleasure of the sea and to pamper the palate with small velvet paws. GOURMET Pearl Pleasure of the sea - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.  GOURMET Pearl Pleasure of the sea - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Contains 4 recipes: Deep-sea fish and shrimp, plaice and shrimp, salmon and shrimp, tuna and shrimp

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: for an adult cat of around 4 kg, give 3-4 sachets per day, preferably distributed in at least 2-3 meals. The recommended daily rations are calculated for a cat to moderate activity under normal environment and temperature conditions. Nutritional needs can vary depending on the cat, so it is necessary to adjust these rations in order to maintain it to its shape. Serve at room temperature. Always leave clean and fresh water available to your cat.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) 3 bis 4 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
